description: T.1 Yew - 2m reduction in height, shape to suitable growth points & crown lift to 2.5m from ground level. T.2 Ailanthus - 1m Holistic crown reshape and balance to suitable growth points, reduce over extended branch above road by 2-3m to suitable growth points & deadwood. T.3 Eucalyptus - Fell (Dangerous).
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
